channel.title: NicksPatties: A Nick Patti Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on NicksPatties: A Nick Patti Portfolio

item.title: Resume
item.description: Nicholas Patti Software Engineer MegaResume Software Engineer 2022-09 2023-01 Create a resume building web application using SvelteKit, TypeScript, HTML, and CSS, that allows users to filter out irrelevant content (which was also used to build this resume!) Web app automatically saves the user’s progress, and also permits saving data to a file, and loading data from a file Data that is added by the user in the resume form is automatically displayed in a resume preview component Created a mobile interface that is usable on Android and iOS mobile devices.
